summary: Implements a Home Assistant switch platform that lets users enable or disable motion detection on Hikvision cameras. It defines configuration validation, sets up the switch entity during platform initialization, and provides a toggle entity that reflects the current motion detection state and updates the camera via its API.
business_intent: Provide Home Assistant users with a simple way to control Hikvision camera motion detection through the UI or automations, integrating camera security features into home automation workflows.
